body: Well it's true that this is a Pirate Site :P
Wait.. whoa! These are pirated?!
Dude nhentai is the most hated page for Japanese artist. You're reading piracy and think you have the right to complaint about their fetish? That's delusional lmao
Ruthless, but it's not really guro. The gore is very minimal and only on one page.
Ugh, guro …
If this was a series and turned into a book it'd be so epic.
Ngl tho I hope this becomes a series
I hope he goes back to doing more slavery. I love when he does sexual slavery stuff. Dolls is my favorite from him and I want a doll too.

Ok comments about Fan no Hitori guro. Have you guys actually read all his work? It's prevalent and it's fantastical. His style lends itself to be a caricature of the genre. Have you read his latest compilation book with other artists? Art can be intense af and no limits. But it's still art. Thank goodness...

Is that Chloe from Kuroinu with "Sold Out" on her ass? Page 2 is great with the lineup of ladies, but really wish this didn't include the mutilation later on. I like Fan no Hitori's style, and he's done a few great works I'm all about, I just wish he'd scale back on horrific things like that. Sexy women getting fucked silly and dominated? Great content. Sexy women getting permanently disfigured? Not very enjoyable.
Enough about that. Who's everyone's favorite slave?
Just report all the mean people in the comments that attack real people over fantasy kinks. Trust me, it works. Make this site a little less toxic
Yeah I guess you're right.I just can't stand people like him especially in the internet.I'll try to be more considerate when starting arguments with other people next time....
I love the variety of characters in this piece. So much fun. Queen for the win!

Disliking a kink doesn't give you the right to insult the author. Grow up.


Great art as always, I wonder if we will ever get to see one of his popular works in color. 
And maybe longer chapters again. 🙏

I swear to god these comment sections man....😔
Damn bro obscure entity man chill out! Arguing with these people on the internet ain't worth it man. Plus i don't think that guy even checked back into the same doujin to see if anyone responded. Good thing too otherwise the back and forth between the two of you would never have stopped. I have seen the same comment wars behavior on other doujins and the accounts that don,t stop posting verbally abusive comments are getting removed as of late, no joke. Don't respond to haters like them please.
If your mommy and daddy treated you like shit that  isn't a valid reason to be a fucking jerk on the internet.You need someone in your life bro.

You probably don't go to school or taught by your parents about morals or internet etiquettes to not discriminate what other's like.Yeah I know you can express your thoughts and comments on comment sections but insulting is another matter you're basically shitting on other people's preferences and the hardwork of the artist.He probably works harder than your dumb ass could sitting all day shitting on comment sections.Also your stereotyphication about me being an American is dumb, I'm a Filipino and life here is pretty hard but that doesn't make me an uneducated asshole like you could ever be.Read about respect and morals "Annalbelle69"

Obscure entity - What a dumbass bastard you are, it's a fucking comment section bitch I can say whatever the fuck I want about the author. Guess what little boy, the comment section is not always sunshine and rainbows it about Expressing the readers thoughts on the doujin whether they are positive or negative. And why the fuck are you so butthurt about a stranger insulting a random hentai artist, is he your dad or some shit huh?
You must be an american, no one else could be this petty and pathetic on the internet.
I understand everyone has their own preferences and opinions but that doesn't mean you could shit on other's fetishes let alone insult the artist

Bruhh read it or leave it,easy as that.Hentai is supposed to release stress with whatever fetish the readers desire.Go back to your vanilla shit if you're that soft,you don't have the right to call the man stupid just because you don't like his work, you vanilla coomer.
Okay 👌.

It was fairly decent until I saw what they did to the halfling woman. That is just so unnecessarily cruel and heartless man. Even if it's a drawn picture. I don't know about reading more of this artist's work anymore after seeing that because I was really turned on by some of his earlier doujins. Fuck em don't fucking amputate and mutilate them you stupid motherfucker.
